Uses of FingerNotifier in wiitracker.fingertracking
 

Classes in wiitracker.fingertracking that implement FingerNotifier
 class FingerConverter
          Marks points reported at 1023, 1023, the default value, as off-screen.
 class FingerLabeler
          Labels the fingers based on the distance between the points and assumptions about the shape of the hand.
 class TransformNotifier
          This singleton class wraps the PerspectiveTransform class for detail hiding and to make it fit in the pipeline.
 

Uses of FingerNotifier in wiitracker.ui
 

Constructors in wiitracker.ui with parameters of type FingerNotifier
CalibrationUI(motej.Mote m, FingerNotifier pipeline)
          Creates the UI for gathering points from the Wii Remote to be used as the corner points.
PointTrackerUI.MoteSettingsPanel(motej.Mote m, FingerNotifier pipeline)
          Create a new settings panel which controls the sensitivity of a Wiimote.
PointTrackerUI(motej.Mote m, FingerNotifier notifier, java.awt.geom.Point2D[] corners)
          Create a window which draws points representing the points seen by the Wiimote and which controls the Wiimote's sensitivity.
